abstract: Rio Tinto’s stock dropped as much as 5 percent amid growing speculation the global miner is set to launch a 5-billion-pound rights issue instead of selling $19.5 billion in stock and assets to China’s Chinalco.
snippet: Rio Tinto’s stock dropped as much as 5 percent amid growing speculation the global miner is set to launch a 5-billion-pound rights issue instead of selling $19.5 billion in stock and assets to China’s Chinalco.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto‘s stock dropped as much as 5 percent, tracking its London shares lower, on growing speculation the global miner is set to launch a 5-billion-pound rights issue instead of selling $19.5 billion in stock and assets to China’s Chinalco aluminum group, The Telegraph reported.

headline.main: Rio Shares Drop Amid Talk of Rights Issue
